message: Came across the dry crud plugin, which has some cool auto-generators for your crud views.  Has anyone used this or a comparable plugin in a project?  Did it add value or end up just getting in the way?
Haven't seen this before but I like the idea as this kind of code often gets repeated. I think @Blaze used something like this for launchwith.me.
Going to try this out in an app right now. Will let you know how it goes!
